responses.rationale: Describes a planned action/safeguard ('will start vaccinating birds') without active reassurance.
Discusses a perceived lack of capability and expresses negative sentiment, not a factual statement of capability.
Describes a recommended safeguard ('urging dairy workers to wear personal protective equipment') without active reassurance.
Describes a recommended safeguard ('urging dairy workers to wear personal protective equipment') without active reassurance.
Describes the potential impact of the threat overwhelming systems, not a statement of capability.
Discusses potential future problems related to preparedness (vaccine hoarding), not a statement of capability.
Reports a factual event (an outbreak), does not describe capability or preparedness.
Describes a safeguard/protocol ('none of the infected birds are allowed into the nationâ€™s food supply') without active reassurance.
Describes symptoms/impact, does not describe capability or preparedness.
Describes a safeguard/protocol ('none of the infected birds are allowed into the nation's food supply') without active reassurance.
Describes response/surveillance measures ('had been tested', 'are being 'actively monitored'') without active reassurance.
Describes a state of mind ('on edge') and factual spread, not capability or preparedness.
